body:
Or you could have a `Warning` instead of a `ValueError`. Something like this could be a solution right:
```python
if dimensions < 2:
    warnings.warn("Fan in and fan out can not be computed for tensor with less than 2 dimensions, hence initializing all zeros", RuntimeWarning)
    return constant(tensor, 0)
```

I feel this is more appropriate since that can't be classified as an error per se.
